result.title: A cool problem with integer !
result.content:
I found a nice problems in a shorts contest that :

"Calculator the numbers of non-integer pair (X, Y) such that A*X + B*Y is a integer and C*X + D*Y is a integer too

0 < X , Y < 1;

0 < A, B, C, D < 1e9 and they are integer."

I'm finding to a cool solution, please help me !!
